thread.title: Newswire: Tall Friend wants to hear what you’re thinking on “Cockroach”
thread.title_full: Newswire: Tall Friend wants to hear what you’re thinking on “Cockroach”

author: David Anthony
title: Newswire: Tall Friend wants to hear what you’re thinking on “Cockroach”
text:
Jan 3, 2017 10:01 AM Tall Friend (Photo courtesy of Exploding In Sound) Tall Friend (Photo courtesy of Exploding In Sound) Share Tweet 
Last year, Tall Friend self-released its debut EP, Tawl Friend , a collection of slack-pop songs that showed Charlie Pfaff’s knack for simple, affecting melodies. On January 27, Exploding In Sound Records will re-release Tawl Friend both digitally and on cassette, while also releasing Tall Friend‘s debut album, Safely Nobody’s , this spring. Today The A.V. Club is premiering “Cockroach,” a song from Tawl Friend that’s been unavailable on streaming services for a little bit. It’s a song that shows Pfaff’s ability to craft a song that sounds effortless yet still makes every moment count, making every new part feel essential and exciting. 
Pre-orders for Tawl Friend are available now through Exploding In Sound . Tall Friend tour dates 
1/5—All Night Diner—Philadelphia, PA @ w/ Swings, Foozle & gobbinjr1/6—Trans-Pecos—Queens, NY w/ Swings, Zula & Cleo Tucker1/19—Shea Stadium—Brooklyn, NY w/ Washer, Rick Rude & Kiss Concert
